Package wellen

Class Sequencer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • wellen.Sequencer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of sequenced data. usually, int or float but could be also be a complex data types.
    public class Sequencer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    a container for values ( e.g musical notes ) that can be played back step by step.
